#summary Use case for handling logging into an existing user account..
#labels Phase-Requirements,UseCase

= Introduction =

*Description:*

A user logs into his/her account.

*Preconditions:*
 # User has already registered an account.
 # The account has been activated.
 # User is not logged in.
 # User is viewing the log in page.

*Postconditions:*
 # The user will be logged into the system.

= Basic Course of Action =

 # A user wants to log in.
 # User enters his email address.
 # User enters his password.
 # User submits the form.
 # The system verifies that the email address and password match the entry in the database.
 # The system creates a new session for the user.
 # The system displays a success page confirming that the user is now logged in.
 # Use case ends.
